attributes.action: Why Major Phil Packer was not recognised in the Queen's Birthday Honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to know why Major Phil Packer was not included in the Queens birthday honours list despite the fact that he has repeatedly proven himself to be deserving of recognition from his country not only for his service to his country and other territories but also as a shining example to all of us in the face of serious injury and permanent disability.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
